entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 12:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -12.7°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
